name: ActivatedPartialThromboplastinTime
title: Activated partial thromboplastin time
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a blood, serum or plasma activated partial thromboplastin time (aPTT) test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum or plasma for activated partial thromboplastin time (aPTT). Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Laboratory Test category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include LOINC activated partial thromboplastin time (aPTT) lab tests using the source of blood, serum or plasma with a reporting scale of seconds.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
